has product sense and an appetite for making new things, as opposed to talent for selling things," said Michael Hawley , a longtime M.I.T. professor who knows Mr. Larry Page socially and has advised him on writing projects. Larry Page is more the archetype of founder, innovator, hacker, inventor, interested in all of the magical things that digital technologies do. But others say that Mr. Eric Schmidt 's two biggest job responsibilities- being the public face of the company and managing internal politics- are areas where Mr. Larry Page has less experience.
